definition: PhD degree (Doctor of Philosophy)/also abbr. to 博士學位|博士学位
pinyin: zhe2 xue2 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

sentences.english: These ten are broad and even a bit philosophical.
sentences.chinese: 這十條貼士很寬泛，甚至有一點偏哲學。

sentences.english: In fact, it is more of a philosophy that envelops every aspect of the project.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，它更是一種涵蓋了項目的各個方面的哲學。

sentences.english: But philosophically the approaches are identical.
sentences.chinese: 但是哲學上的途徑確是相同的。

sentences.english: Gratifying results were achieved in the studies of philosophy and other social sciences.
sentences.chinese: 哲學社會科學研究取得一批可喜成果。

sentences.english: Pre-Socratic natural Philosopher, member of the Ionian School.
sentences.chinese: 前蘇格拉底自然哲學家，伊奧尼亞學派成員。

sentences.english: Describe your philosophy about the art of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 描述一下你的時裝藝術哲學。

sentences.english: Philosophy got rise to the mediation of human being and its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 哲學產生於對人的存在及其意義的反思。

sentences.english: 《Principle of Statute Philosophy》 is about the philosophy of rights.
sentences.chinese: 《法哲學原理》是關於權利的哲學。

sentences.english: 《Principle of Statute Philosophy》 is about the philosophy of rights.
sentences.chinese: 《法哲學原理》是關於權利的哲學。

sentences.english: But there's a philosophical objection to the entire question.
sentences.chinese: 但是這裏有個哲學上的反對於整個問題。

sentences.english: He Lin recognized the necessity of modernization of philosophical methodology.
sentences.chinese: 賀麟清醒的認識到哲學方法論現代化的必要性。

sentences.english: There is, as we know, a philosophy which denies the infinite.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道有一種否認無極的哲學。

sentences.english: Philosophers have posed this moral dilemma for decades.
sentences.chinese: 哲學家們提出這樣的一個道德兩難已經很多年了。

sentences.english: Philosophic base is the inner basis and authentic essence of teaching theory.
sentences.chinese: 哲學基礎是教學論的內在根據和本真靈魂。

sentences.english: Fourth, the traditional social philosophy is pluralistic in its values.
sentences.chinese: 傳統處世哲學在價值層面呈現著多元取向。

sentences.english: So there was a huge variety of philosophy in ancient Greece.
sentences.chinese: 古希臘存在着大量的哲學流派。

definition: theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
